dc_title_s: Carte nouvelle de l'Amerique angloise: Contenant la Virginie, Mary-Land, Caroline, Pennsylvania, Nouvelle Iorck, N. Iarsey, N. France, et les terres nouvellement decouerte dresse sur les relations les plus nouvelles
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Author attribution based on LC's cataloging of earlier variant of same title, and Cumming 129, published "chez Pierre Mortier Libraire," [1700]. "Avec privilege de nos Seigneurs les Etats." J. Covens and C. Mortier began operating as a firm in 1721--Stock catalogs of maps and atlases by Covens & Mortier, p. 11. Originally printed on 2 sheets. Includes inset of Boston harbor area.: Original version published Amsterdam: Chez Jean CÃ³vens et Corneille Mortier, [172-?]. Scale approximately 1:6,000,000
